name: 2020 Regulatory Consulting
membership: Sheenagh Gordon-Hart is a Fellow of the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England & Wales and a member of ILA
goal: To interpret regulatory change through the investor lens and to assist asset managers, pension funds and other market participants understand the impact of regulatory reforms, and to formulate appropriate responses.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives: MiFID 2, UCITS, PRIIPs, AIFMD, IORPs, CMU, EMIR, Passporting, Solvency 2, ELTIFs
